title: PIA to partner Pak Street Child football team for Norway Cup
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP):Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) will be the partner of Pakistan Street Child Football Team for Norway Cup 2024.
According to a statement issued here, it is an important step by PIA to support the young talent of Pakistan.
Pakistan Street Child Football Team is participating in Norway Cup 2024, which is the biggest youth football tournament in the world.
The Pakistan Street Child Football Team was the runner-up in the Norway Cup last year and is one of the best teams participating in the Cup.
The talented youngsters are excited to become Norway Cup champions.
